metadata.title: NA Speaker expresses grief over passing Jamshed Thomas

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, May 21 (APP):Speaker National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq has expressed deep sorrow and grief over the demise of former Member of the National Assembly (MNA) Jamshed Thomas. In his condolence message, he extended heartfelt sympathies to the family of the late Jamshed Thomas and prayed for strength and patience for them in this time of great loss. He said Jamshed Thomas was a patriotic and active parliamentarian who always raised his voice for the rights of minorities and promoted interfaith harmony in the country. Ayaz Sadiq said that Jamshed Thomas's valuable services will be remembered for a long time. The Speaker prayed that the Almighty grants the bereaved family the fortitude to bear this irreparable loss.
